game.name: MOMO.EXE
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Horror game where you need to do different tasks from horror creature received by your phone. And remember: Don't chat with MOMO!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Horror game where you need to do different tasks from horror creature received by your phone. And remember: Don't chat with MOMO!

reviewHighlights.text: 모모 시발새끼가 리뷰 쓰라고 존나 협박해서 쓴다 모모 시발새끼진ㅉ짲 ㅈ좆같은 새끼네 저거
아음..그래픽은 괜춘. 그리고 쉬움,짧음. 나쁘지 않음. 그렇다고 추천은 못하겠네..
